Name: 狼と香辛料VR/Spice&WolfVR
About the game: In order to achieve our dreams of entering the 2nd dimension, we will be working together with the original creators of Spice and Wolf to create a VR animation. Anime will evolve from something that is “seen” to something that is “experienced”... -Story- Kraft Lawrence is a traveling merchant who meets Holo, a beautiful woman who can transform into a wolf. As they travel together they face many hardships, such as having to walk in the rain. In order to avoid the sudden downpour, Holo and Lawrence take shelter in an old, abandoned water mill in the woods. They huddle around a small fire and enjoy a slightly strange but relaxing time together. You are able to share that time together with them. Production Staff Scenario: Isuna Hasekura Character Design: Ju Ayakura Holo’s CV: Ami Koshimizu Kraft Lawrence’s CV: Jun Fukuyama Even if you do not have a VR headset, you can enjoy anime and mini games in non-VR mode.
